Introduction
This topic contains information on the effects of renouncements of the right to benefits, including
effect of renouncement of the right to
disability compensation on disability evaluations
Veterans Pension on a rating of permanent and total disability
, and
DIC on other beneficiaries of the same class
effect of a surviving spouse’s renouncement of the right to DIC on the Veteran’s surviving children
, and
effect of renouncement of the right to disability compensation on a dependent’s entitlement to DEA
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4  - Renouncements
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section None
